title: Stock Futures Edge Down Ahead of Earnings; Oil Drops
sub_head: Quarterly results are due from Netflix and IBM after markets close
body:
U.S. stock futures edged down on Tuesday, as investors looked ahead to a cross-section of corporate earnings reports for insights on how businesses were weathering a period of rampant inflation.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 eased 0.1% a day after major indexes posted gentle declines. Blue-chip Dow Jones Industrial Average futures also shed 0.1% and technology-heavy Nasdaq-100 futures slipped 0.2%.
